short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mint Zora Notes from any webpage on the internet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mint Notes is a chrome extension that allows anyone to Create Zora Notes from any webpage on the internet. 

How-to:
— Highlight text, right-click and click "Mint to Notes"
— Click "Mint Notes" extension to access your Notes Collection
